article_title: US airman surprises son at football game by wearing opponent’s uniform « The Greenroom
article_text:
Video: US airman surprises son at football game by wearing opponent’s uniform

posted at 12:01 pm on September 28, 2013 by Ed Morrissey

I post ’em because I love ’em. God bless them all, and may every one of their reunions be as joyous.

Watch the latest video at video.foxnews.com
